body_html: We have found nobody with a valid use case for absolute paths. However, changing this behavior would be a behavior change and we would rather add the option than break someone, hence the option. We have changed Estimator to always save relative paths.
body_text: We have found nobody with a valid use case for absolute paths. However, changing this behavior would be a behavior change and we would rather add the option than break someone, hence the option. We have changed Estimator to always save relative paths.
body: We have found nobody with a valid use case for absolute paths. However, changing this behavior would be a behavior change and we would rather add the option than break someone, hence the option. We have changed `Estimator` to always save relative paths.
